### Summary of changes

                  ✧ Chirping        ⋆ Chirping        ✺ Chirping        ✺ Chirping        · Chirping.       ✦ Chirping.       ✹ Chirping.       * Chirping.       ✺ Chirping..      ✺ Chirping..      · Chirping..      ✺ Chirping..      ✦ Chirping...     * Chirping...     ✦ Chirping...     * Chirping...     ✧ Chirping        ✳ Chirping        * Chirping        * Chirping        · Chirping.       ✹ Chirping.       ⋆ Chirping.       ⋆ Chirping.       ✺ Chirping..      ⋆ Chirping..      ✧ Chirping..      · Chirping..      ✳ Chirping...     · Chirping...     · Chirping...     ✳ Chirping...     ✳ Chirping        ⋆ Chirping        · Chirping                          Plan description: Create a blog visits tracking system with a landing datasource for events and an endpoint to show top visited pages.

Steps:
1. Datasource: blog_visits - Landing table to store blog visit events with page URL, timestamp, and visitor information
2. Endpoint: top_pages - API endpoint to return the most visited pages with visit counts
3. Build project
4. Generate mock data: blog_visits
